main event: A round object approximately half the diameter of a full moon was observed for 30 seconds before disappearing at the same point it appeared.
interesting points: The object made noise that did not attract the attention of the observers,The sighting occurred on November 12, 1955, in Glen Avon, California,The object was described as round and small with a faint trail,The observers did not associate the noise with the object,Opinions varied on the object's identity, suggesting it might be a balloon or aircraft.
